member.name: DML_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the data type of the values in a tensor. DirectML operators may not support all data types; see the documentation for each specific operator to find which data types it supports.

member.name: DML_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE.DML_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_UNKNOWN
member.summary: Indicates an unknown data type. This value is never valid.

member.name: DML_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE.DML_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_UINT32
member.summary: Indicates a 32-bit unsigned integer data type.

member.name: DML_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE.DML_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_UINT16
member.summary: Indicates a 16-bit unsigned integer data type.

member.name: DML_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE.DML_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_UINT8
member.summary: Indicates a 8-bit unsigned integer data type.

member.name: DML_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE.DML_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_INT32
member.summary: Indicates a 32-bit signed integer data type.

member.name: DML_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE.DML_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_INT16
member.summary: Indicates a 16-bit signed integer data type.

member.name: DML_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE.DML_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_INT8
member.summary: Indicates a 8-bit signed integer data type.
